scripts.tauri:build-signed: npm run tauri:build && npm run tauri:sign-msi
scripts.tauri:sign-msi: powershell -Command "signtool sign /f $env:SIGN_CERT /p $env:SIGN_CERT_PASS /tr http://timestamp.digicert.com /td sha256 /fd sha256 'Backend/target/release/bundle/msi/Search Tool_0.21.0_x64_en-US.msi'"
scripts.tauri:sign-nsis: powershell -Command "signtool sign /f $env:SIGN_CERT /p $env:SIGN_CERT_PASS /tr http://timestamp.digicert.com /td sha256 /fd sha256 'Backend/target/release/bundle/nsis/Search Tool_0.21.0_x64-setup.exe'"
scripts.tauri:build-signed-nsis: npm run tauri:build && npm run tauri:sign-nsis
